summary: A group of friends in New York, working away at their PCs and laptops, keep in touch exclusively by phone and fax. They are all too busy to meet face to face. Gale plays matchmaker, by ... See full summary Â»
cast: Tim Daly|Caroleen Feeney|Dan Gunther|Dana Wheeler-Nicholson|Liev Schreiber|Aida Turturro|Alanna Ubach|Sylvia Miles|Mark Blum|Jean-Claude La Marre|Hal Salwen
title: Denise te llama
